name: NANO BIO INFORMATION COGNITIVE TECHNOLOGY WATCH
goal: Lobbying on nano bio information and cognitive technologies. The organisation aims at influencing the EU Institutions and policy makers toward fostering innovation as well as citizens' protection in a common ethical technological framework.
interests: Business and Industry, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Food Safety, Foreign affairs and security policy, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
Resolution on Civil Law Rules on Robotics
EGE Declaration on Genetics
DG Connect, DG Just, European Parliament, EPRS, STOA on the ethical and legal impact of New technologies: robotics, AI, genetics... on EU citizens and customers.

270 researchers in AI and Robotics gathered in our OPEN LETTER TO THE EC ON AI AND ROBOTICS
www.robotics-openletter.eu
